description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/retrieve-an-event-for-a-project/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/events/retrieve-an-event-for-a-project/)

Return details on an individual event.

### Path Parameters

`organization_slug` *(string)*REQUIRED

The slug of the organization the event belongs to.

`project_slug` *(string)*REQUIRED

The slug of the project the event belongs to.

`event_id` *(string)*REQUIRED

The ID of the event to retrieve. It is the hexadecimal ID as reported by the client.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `project:read`
